item.description:
That's it, summer is officially over tomorrow. We're ringing in the Fall with an October meetup at MIT. We have three amazing companies presenting this month, with a great range of very early stage to veteran startups.

October Presenters:
1) JoyTunes - Yuval Kaminka - CEO & Founder (@joytunescom)
2) Onset Technology - Dan Inbar
(@OnsetTechnology)
3) Lifesta - Yael Gavish CEO & Founder (@Lifesta)

When & Where:
MIT
Building E51 - Room 335
70 Memorial Drive
Cambridge, MA

Agenda:
6:30pm-7:00pm Networking & Intros (Pizza)
7:00pm-8:00pm Product Demos, Group Q&A, Voting
8:00pm-8:30pm Member Announcements & Networking

Looking to hire top Israeli talent?
Post free on the TechAviv Job Board

Thanks to our Sponsors
The Boston TechAviv Founders Club is made possible because we have great sponsors. Special thanks to:
Nixon Peabody and are new sponsor ExchangeGuru!

Sponsorship Opportunities
Please email Gil or Yaron if you are interested or know somebody who is interested in sponsoring the Boston branch or global TechAviv Founders Club.

See you soon!

Gil & Yaron
@giljzim
@YaronSamid
@TechAviv
www.techaviv.com
item.name: TechAviv MA October 2010 Meetup
